Name: Divine Legacy
About the game: DESCRIPTION Divine Legacy is a dark story/character-driven action RPG with hints of humor, friendship, and bonds. Fight your way through hordes of demons, and move one step closer towards the truth! The god of the damned declared war to the celestial kingdom and the human realm suffer its consequences. In a world where all hope is lost, a hero seeks to make things right once again, but he's only human... Or is he? FEATURES About 10 hours of story content Detailed and lively graphics Intense real-time action combat system 5 playable characters, each with a different and unique combat style Extra concept artworks Hidden collectibles Over 40 achievements Extra post-story content Extra, optional cutscenes and hidden dialogues Secret unlockable content
